tag_list: neomobile, onebip, mobile-commerce, mobile-payments, mobile-entertainment, smartphone
overview: Gianluca D’Agostino is a successful entrepreneur and a pioneer in business innovation in the mobile industry. He’s the co-founder and CEO of Neomobile, the global Mobile Commerce Group, leader in Europe and Latam. Gianluca has a cumulated 20 years international experience, both in starting up mobile initiatives (Neomobile, Fusion and Freever) and in corporations such as TIM, Telecom Italia and Kpmg. He’s today an evangelist in mobile entertainment, mobile payment and mobile marketing, lecturer and speaker in several industry events worldwide.

degrees.subject: Electronic Engineering
degrees.institution: Università degli Studi di Roma 'La Sapienza'
